# arubacloud_kmip (Data Source)
```terraform
data "arubacloud_kmip" "basic" {
  id = "kmip-id"
}
```
  Reads an existing ArubaCloud KMIP instance.
---

# arubacloud_kmip (Data Source)

Reads an existing ArubaCloud KMIP instance.

```terraform
data "arubacloud_kmip" "basic" {
  id = "kmip-id"
}
```
